subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The owners of the Nashville Superspeedway have announced that no Nascar races will be held at the track in 2012, and that it may be put up for sale.
snippet: The owners of the Nashville Superspeedway have announced that no Nascar races will be held at the track in 2012, and that it may be put up for sale.
